headlines: Here’s what happened in crypto today
Crypto losses near $3.4B as hackers went ‘big game hunting’
Federal Reserve Board publishes first of several staff manuals for the supervision of the largest and most complex banks
Federal Reserve Board withdraws 2023 policy statement and issues new policy statement regarding the treatment of certain Board-supervised banks that facilitates responsible innovation
Federal Reserve Board announces termination of enforcement actions with The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc. and Metropolitan Commercial Bank
events: Major hack involving $40M drained from a multisig wallet
Uniswap performance surge in CoinDesk 20 index (adoption signal)
Regulatory figure Caroline Pham joining MoonPay (potential regulatory alignment)
DTCC launching tokenized securities on Canton Network (institutional adoption)
Regulatory guidance from US Fed blocking banks from engaging with crypto
Bitcoin ETF inflows of $457M (third-largest since October)
Trump Media's merger with TAE Technologies (institutional move)
Former SEC counsel discusses RWA compliance, signaling regulatory scrutiny
